author: {'steamid': '76561198067537394', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 385, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 385, 'last_played': 1433008634}
review: Bon jeu avec une histoire correcte car la fin ne m'a pas convaincu. Mis à part les moments où on doit chercher des objets inutiles avec des noms étranges (mauvaises traductions) pour trouver celui dont on a besoin, les énigmes diverses sont plutôt pas mal. Mais je ne vous apprends rien, c'est tout simplement un point and click dans les règles de l'art. La petite histoire bonus m'a consolé de la fin, que je n'ai pas su apprécier.

author: {'steamid': '76561198117791534', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 270, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 270, 'last_played': 1436730159}
review:
If you're a HOG fan, then you probably already know that Artifex Mundi games are good stuff and that Abyss: The Wraiths of Eden won't disappoint you.  Like most of their games, there's decent variety in the scenes and puzzles combined with just enough running around, item combo, and actual story line to keep you interested throughout the game.  You do locate a map in this game, which becomes helpful in the later part of the story when you are running around more.  

The ending was done well and leaves itself open for a sequel.  If there is a sequel, I will definitely play it.  Side note - I also enjoyed the bonus chapter, which is a prequel for two of the characters in the main storyline.

author: {'steamid': '76561198028450654', 'num_games_owned': 5809, 'num_reviews': 161, 'playtime_forever': 306, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 200, 'last_played': 1578391672}
review:
Ich spiele total gerne Wimmelbildspiele. Ich hatte mich vorhin noch einmal gefragt warum eigentlich. Ich glaube es liegt daran, dass sie nicht besonders anspruchsvoll sind, aber meistens eine recht interessante Story erzählen. Letzteres ist mir an Spielen soweiso immer am wichtigsten. Zudem ist es so, dass ich täglich sicher 10-12 Stunden arbeite, meistens 6 Tage die Woche und Abends dann keine große Lust mehr habe auf einen AAA Titel, sondern eher noch 1-2 Stunden vor der Daddelkiste entspannen will. Dann kommen solche Wimmelbildspiele immer gut bei mir an, weil sie eben nicht sehr schwer zu lösen sind, ein entspanntes spielen also.

Abyss: The Wraiths of Eden hat mir dabei besonders gut gefallen, weil nicht nur die Story gut erzählt wird, sondern weil sie auch spannend ist. Man will sozusagen die ganze Zeit wissen wie es weitergeht und klickt das Spiel in einem Rutsch durch. Zugegeben, das ist nicht sehr lange, etwa 3 Stunden, aber 3 interessante Stunden. Das Besondere war auch, dass man an einer Stelle irgendwann dachte "Jetzt könnte es zuende sein", also man das Gefühl hatte man ist dem Ende relativ nahe und dann passierte noch einmal was, was man so nicht erahnt hätte und das Spiel wurde dann, obwohl es schon anfing langweilig zu werden, noch einmal sehr spannend. Das Finale wurde dann sozusagen eingeläutet und ab da hatte das Spiel noch einmal richtig Spaß gemacht. Für mich ein Highlight unter den Wimmelbildspielen.

[url=mediennerd.de/neu-auf-steam/]Mehr STEAM Spiele die mir gefallen[/url]

author: {'steamid': '76561197997741024', 'num_games_owned': 7542, 'num_reviews': 58, 'playtime_forever': 203, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 56, 'last_played': 1441371459}
review:
Another Artifex Mundi point and click puzzle adventure game. Reminds me a lot of the days spend playing 7th Guest back in the day. Unlike '9 Clues: The Secret of Serpent Creek' - this game shows a great deal of promise - having only played an hour so far. It has striking smooth visuals, and the puzzles won't leave you throwing your computer out of the window - and will run on most systems. It's £7 in the UK, and even if the game only gives you a few hours of entertainment, it'll be worth the money, and judging by how the game has proceeded thus far, I'd be inclined to recommend this to anyone who likes puzzle adventures.

Not so sure about the 'spot-the-item' sections, which can be bypassed by playing dominoes - perhaps this is to avoid having sections which may prove too hard for some. Who knows. In any case, it looks like a great family-friendly game, with added spookiness!

If you see it on sale, it's a no-brainer.

Once again, I've recorded my gameplay for your perusal:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=m-nftCrs-y4

author: {'steamid': '76561197972076777', 'num_games_owned': 1870, 'num_reviews': 101, 'playtime_forever': 273, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 273, 'last_played': 1437146511}
review: Dość przyjemna, nastrojowa, prościutka "przygodówka" połączona z grą typu hidden objects. Bardzo widać inspirację Bioshockiem, przynajmniej jeśli chodzi o miejsce akcji. Niestety wersja polska jest kiepska - w scenach z odnajdywaniem przedmiotów widać, że tłumacz nie miał gry do dyspozycji, a testy lokalizacji nie istniały. Szczotka nazywa się pędzlem (brush), marchewka (carrot) papugą (parrot), manierka flaszką! TAKIE RZECZY SĄ NIEDOPUSZCZALNE W PRZYPADKU, GDY TRZEBA SZUKAĆ PRZEDMIOTÓW WEDŁUG NAZW. Dodatkowo liczne błędy ortograficzne itp. w rodzaju "aleji", "chłodziarnia" (zamiast chłodnia), "sworzenia" (zamiast sworznia). Nie polecam, chyba że w oryginale.

author: {'steamid': '76561198071705187', 'num_games_owned': 196, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 441, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 441, 'last_played': 1423851055}

author: {'steamid': '76561198062720007', 'num_games_owned': 396, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 440, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 440, 'last_played': 1436798476}
review:
W Abyss: The Wraiths of Eden wcielamy się w postać kobiety, udającej się na poszukiwania zaginionego męża i nurka, Roberta, który nie powrócił z ekspedycji. Już we wczesnej fazie gry, fabuła intryguje i przykuwa do monitora. Główna bohaterka natrafia na klimatyczne, podwodne miasto, do złudzenia przypominające miejsca znane z gry BioShock. Fabuła jest wciągająca, a ciekawość gracza podnoszą niespodziewane elementy horroru, które pozostawiają uczucie, iż główna bohaterka nie jest sama i czycha na nią śmiertelne niebezpieczeństwo.

Abyss to interesująca gra łączaca elementy przygodówek point & click, puzzli oraz horroru. To ciekawe połącznie, zapewnia wciągająca rozgrywkę i dobry klimat. W grze nie utkniemy na przekombinowanych łamigłówlach i irracjonalnych sytuacjach. Całość jest spójna a decyzje i czynności są logiczne i przedstawione klarownie. Nic tak nie irytuje w tego typu grach, jak momenty, gdy nie wiemy, gdzie udać się dalej i krążymy bez końca po dostępnych lokacjach, niosąc w ekwipunku np. pędzel, dwa grzebienie i wykałaczkę. Ta gra jest pozbawiona zniechęcających niedopowiedzeń. Na drodze odkrywania kolejnych obszarów, natrafimy na rozmaite puzzle, o zróżnicowanym stopniu trudności. Rozwiązując napotykane zagadki, nie ma się poczucia, iż twórcy powtarzają się. Każda łamigłówka jest inna od poprzedniej. Pozytywny efekt dopełnia ładna grafika, klimatyczna muzyka i rzadko spotykana w tego typu grach, możliwość wybrania języka polskiego.

Dla łowców osiągnięć, gra również jest atrakcyjna. Zdobycie wszystkich 20 osiągnięc zajęło mi około 7h. Są wśród nich osiągnięcia odnoszące się do samej fabuły zdobywane automatycznie, jak i te, które wymagają od nas trochę więcej starań, ale większość z nich nie sprawia skrajnych trudności i ukończenie gry na 100% jest jak najbardziej możliwe.

author: {'steamid': '76561198044357305', 'num_games_owned': 3570, 'num_reviews': 123, 'playtime_forever': 265, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 265, 'last_played': 1436620514}
review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198075152186', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 325, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 325, 'last_played': 1435667133}
review:
Un classico gioco "oggetti nascosti" della Artifex, in una ambientazione marina alla Rapture; di per sè la storia e i puzzle non sono male, ma soffrono di alcuni problemi di traduzione (in italiano), forse più di altri titoli di questo genere, e sono davvero troppo semplici (rispetto allo standard Artifex). 
Da notare inoltre che è un gioco piuttosto breve, quindi lo consiglio agli appassionati, ma acquistatelo in saldo, non è il top di categoria.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027424772', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 213, 'playtime_forever': 879, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 879, 'last_played': 1520491489}
review:
[b][u]Game Information[/u][/b]

"Abyss: The Wraiths of Eden" is a Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game. The game was developed and published by Artifex Mundi.

[b][u]The Game Review[/u][/b]

Game Visuals

I want to mention that the visuals in the game are nicely done with a painted feel to them. The visuals can be adjusted in the game's option menu.

Game Audio

I want to mention that audio for the game is well done. Even though the audio is somewhat simplistic and repetitive. The audio can be adjusted in the game's option menu as well.

Gameplay

There are three different game difficulty modes to choose from: Casual; Advanced and Expert.

The notebook keeps track of progression in the game. Such as story events and clues.

There is no padlock feature that is available to lock the inventory panel in place to make it stationary. The inventory panel does slide up whenever it is being moused over.

There is an interactive map in the game. It allows the player to fast travel between each location quickly without having the need to constantly backtrack. It also indicates that there are a variety of tasks that can be completed at various locations within the game. The interactive map is automatically given at the start of the game.

The hidden object scenes consist of the following: Traditional word lists and Fragmented items. Some of these hidden object scenes may require little or no interactions. Most of the hidden object scenes can be replayed in the game's extra feature section.

There is an optional mini-game: Domino. It is only available during hidden object scenes.

The puzzles are fairly easy to solve without having the need to skip any of them.

There is a bonus chapter in the game. But it can be accessed only after the main story is completed.

There are twenty different achievements that can be unlocked from playing the game. Each of these achievements does come with some requirements that need to be completed before they can be unlocked.

Miscellaneous

There are extra features in the game: Bonus Chapter; Bonus Hidden Object Scenes; Soundtracks; Concept Art and Wallpapers. Most of these extra features can be accessed only after the entire game is completed.

There are six different trading cards to collect. Only three of those trading cards are given out by the game. There are several ways to get the rest of the trading cards: Purchased from the Steam's Community Market; Trade with friends; Booster Packs and its Booster Pack Creator.

Final thoughts: I have found the game enjoyable to certain extent. The replay for the game is low. I would recommend this game, but not at the game's full price value.

author: {'steamid': '76561198210770820', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 558, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 342, 'last_played': 1707587288}
review:
J'ai beaucoup aimé ce jeu qui propose pleins d'aspects différents.
Tout d'abord l'histoire, même si un peu tirée par les cheveux reste très bien ficelée et originale.
Les graphismes sont très bien réussis, sauf pour ce qui est de l'animation des personnages lors des dialogues, mais ça n'est pas un gros problème. 
J'ai apprécié le fait que lors des scènes d'objets cachés nous ayons la possibilité de switcher avec les dominos, ça évite le côté répétitif et parfois un peu lassant surtout lorsqu'on revient sur une même scène. Les autres mini-jeux sont très plaisants aussi. 
Les astuces sont très pratiques cependant, on s'y perdrait un peu sinon.
Pour la durée de jeu je l'ai terminé en environ 5H en prenant plutôt mon temps.

author: {'steamid': '76561198102236617', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 165, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 165, 'last_played': 1434968072}
review:
Now depending on what you looking for this might be great or boring.

The pro's of this game:

+Love the artwork, really nicely done
+ Love the sounds / music 
+The puzzles aren't too hard and are fun to do
+It's a quick game and a good game to kill some boredom.
+Nice cut scenes in between the puzzles

The cons?

+Just like most point and click games it is a rather quick game to play (so don't expect a lot of hours of playtime )
+Travelling is gruesome, you have to click each room (lets say those are 5 steps) so you have to click 5 rooms before getting to a small task (for example finding an object) only to click the same steps back (you do have a map, but you cannot use it for shortcuts...)


All in all i liked most of the game (i played it 2,8h so finished it in one day) But now, after continuesly clicking through those rooms i have to say that my hand / wrist hurts So maybe for all you people out there; buy it on sale and don't play it straight through to avoid my problems xD

author: {'steamid': '76561198116191091', 'num_games_owned': 461, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 962, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 962, 'last_played': 1434756936}
review:
Fervente amatrice des jeux d'objets cachés, j'ai pris grand plaisir à jouer à ce jeu. Les graphismes sont agréables à l’œil, les énigmes sans réelle difficulté mais ne rendent pas le jeu moins plaisant. 
Seul bémol à mes yeux : la VF parfois (très) approximative, qui nous fait chercher bêtement des objets inexistants, ce qui en fait le seul vrai casse-tête du jeu. 

Je le refais pour le simple plaisir d'obtenir tous les succès du jeu !

author: {'steamid': '76561198048206769', 'num_games_owned': 861, 'num_reviews': 76, 'playtime_forever': 987, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 986, 'last_played': 1501156259}
review:
I like these games for the puzzles (mini games), I would be happy with just them and no Hidden Objects and no story. Most of the time, the rest is fun too though. As is the case here.

I played this through a while ago, but not the bonus adventure yet, and wasn't much bothered by achievements. Now I replayed it for those two things. I enjoyed it the first time and had fun a 2nd (and will for a 3rd - for Domino) time. During the 2nd play-through I noticed that the hidden objects in the various scenes change in each play-through. Nice touch.

The hidden object games are just right for my taste (medium difficulty), the story is intriguing. The colourful places have something that really appeals to me.

The puzzles and the Domino as alternative to the hidden object games are fun to do.

I'd have liked an option to jump around on the map as is possible in some of the other games by Artifex Mundi.

It's a shame that the achievements for all hidden object/all Domino games can't be done via the extras, and needs a 2nd play through. On the other hand, as I said the story and the puzzles are fun, so I'll enjoy doing the replay twice even. 

There are few games where I don't turn the music off first thing, so I can't say anthing about that.

author: {'steamid': '76561198054571191', 'num_games_owned': 632, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 524, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 524, 'last_played': 1433336725}
review:
Wie von Artifex Mundi gewohnt, weist auch dieses Wimmelbildspiel eine hohe Qualität auf. 
Anhand einer Story wird man durch verschiedene Schauplätze geführt, an denen man Aufgaben lösen muß um im Spiel voran zu kommen. Diese Aufgaben bestehen zumeist daraus, Objekte zu finden, mit denen man dann ein Minispiel starten kann, welches wiederum zum weiterkommen gelöst weden muß. Die zu suchenden Objekte sind dabei meist in Wimmelbildern versteckt.
Die Wimmelbilder und Minispiele sind dabei nicht besonders schwer zu lösen, machen aber dennoch Spaß. Zumal dadurch jeder die Chance bekommt, das Siel auch durchzuspielen. Schwerer ist es schon, den richtigen Ort zu finden, an dem man dann weiterkommt, oder ein neues Objekt findet. Viele Orte müssen mehrmals besucht werden, was einem manchmal hin und her laufen lässt.

Alles in allem kann ich dieses Spiel für Fans von Wimmelbildspielen nur klar empfehlen, wie übrigens alle Tilel von Artifex Mundi, die ich bisher gespielt habe.

Anmerkung zu den Errungenschaften: Wer alle Errungenschaften erspielen möchte, muss das Spiel zweimal spielen!
Für jedes Wimmelbild kann man alternativ auch ein Dominospiel spielen. Für beides gibt es aber eigene Errungenschaften. Macht nicht den Fehler und spielt mitten im Spiel ein Dominospiel anstelle des Wimmelbildes, oder merkt euch die Stelle genau, um beim zweiten durchspielen dann hier das Wimmelbild zu spielen. Sonst müsst ihr unter Umständen das Spiel ein drittes Mal starten um alle Errungenschaften zu erhalten. Den Fehler habe ich jedenfalls gemacht! ;-)

author: {'steamid': '76561198037092141', 'num_games_owned': 465, 'num_reviews': 69, 'playtime_forever': 395, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 395, 'last_played': 1433188918}
review:
Very enjoyable game. A bit darker than the usual HOG. The game has a lot of jumpscares.

You play a woman (whose name does not come up in the game iirc) trying to find her fiancee who went missing at sea while diving.  When following his footsteps she discovers a mysterious underwater city.

The art is beautiful and the music is good. The puzzles, I found, were either a bit too easy with a few exceptions with "wtf am I doing -spamclick until it works-". The game has 3 difficulty levels, the lowest difficulty shows actions availible on the ingame map and everything useful in the world sparkles. On the hardest no availables are shown and there is no sparkle. 

There is an achievement for not using hints in the HO scenes, but for progressing in the world the hint button is near spammable. As an option instead of the HO scenes this game has a domino game you can do. To get all the achievements in the game you have to go through the game twice; once playing hidden objects and once with dominos. My playtime is one game on hardest difficulty and HO scenes and once with skipping absolutely everything and speeding it.

Pretty much all cutscenes and dialogues are skippable. The map has no teleport option and is mostly useless on the harder modes as you're unlikely to be lost. The story is good,, though I wish you learned more about the world in the game. 

The game is the Collector's edition by default, so it has an extra chapter when you're done with the game as well as wallpapers, music etc. Small nuisance of how the opening cutscene to the game starts playing every time you open it, before the main menu, but as it's skippable it's not a big problem. I encountered no bugs and the game ran smoothly. As tends to be with this company the animation cutscenes is the least impressive part of the game, but still they're not terrible.

author: {'steamid': '76561198013964338', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 265, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 171, 'last_played': 1430427402}
review:
You take the smell of 'bishock', but not the deepness or greatness of it. Just a little smell which makes you more hungry but there is no meal on the table. So turn back to your library and pick an another game to feed your soul.

*Weak scenario
*Weak puzzles (No innovation)
*Worths its price only if its on sale

As a result an ordinary hidden object game

author: {'steamid': '76561198048786610', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 482, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 482, 'last_played': 1440114900}
review:
视觉	 8分 色彩，氛围，场景各方面都烘托的很好，制作者是用了心的。

音效	 6分 中规中矩，没有什么特别的地方。

剧情	 9分 剧情很简洁 ，但是跌宕起伏，而且还有隐藏剧情值得你去发觉。

游戏性   8分 对于解密类游戏来说还可以，但是也不乏有很多可圈可点的地方。对记忆力的要求也比较高。

耐玩性   7分 解密类游戏基本通关就不会再玩了，不过解解成就，做做隐藏剧情，还是比较耗时的。


总分	7.6分  解密类游戏中的精品，如果你是同类爱好者可以购入。

author: {'steamid': '76561198027282668', 'num_games_owned': 2016, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 217, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 217, 'last_played': 1432016030}
review: Pretty good game. I got really sucked into it. The environment was well constructed. Eden is reminiscent of Rapture from Bioshock and slightly like Sierra Madre from Fallout: New Vegas too (what with the weird monster guards roaming the place). The puzzles were enjoyable but a bit on the easy side. I didn't feel compelled to use hints or skip or even look at the map once the whole game. The voice acting was pretty bad though. Very robotic. The story could have been a lot better because the setting and background story to the setting was really good. As it is, it kind of felt like you only touched on the surface of things. The bonus adventure was very worth playing too. Delves a bit deeper in to the story.

author: {'steamid': '76561198194843507', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 492, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 492, 'last_played': 1431267298}

Хорошая убивалка времени с красивыми артами, приятной музыкой, интересным сюжетом и не сильно мудрёными головоломками. Для любителей поиска предметов в самый раз)

10 спрятанных предметов из 10

author: {'steamid': '76561198078799348', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 306, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 306, 'last_played': 1431028206}
review:
Y quien a dicho que una aventura de buscar objetos no puede ser entretenida y de calidad, y encima con una buena historieta, Abyss: The Wraiths of Eden es todo eso y deja un buen sabor de boca, acostumbrado a jugar a este tipo de juegos no representa un reto excesivo pero cumple su cometido de entretenimiento como si de una historieta de libro o comic se tratara, con lo cual invita a llevarlo hasta el final.

El apartado grafico no es ninguna maravilla en tecnologia pero muestra gran colorido y detalle para su desarroyo, la banda sonora y efectos entran en un apartado acorde con el juego, el control y jugabilidad son totalmente correctos y simples, dispone de traduccion de texto en español, por lo cual entenderemos la historia del mismo.

Resumiendo: Estamos ante un buscador de objetos interesante y entretenido, con gancho por la historia que se nos ofrece, y aunque corto, no mas de 2 a 3 horas jugando tranquilamente, nos ofrece un contenido apropiado.

Valoracion final: 8/10 Recomendado.

author: {'steamid': '76561198013815387', 'num_games_owned': 1553, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 251, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 251, 'last_played': 1430886653}
review:
Length of Time Played: ~4 Hours
Distance Played: 100% Achievements
Personal Grade: B

Opinion of Each Aspect

Grading System - Outstanding, Excellent, Good, Acceptable, Poor, Horrendous, Abysmal

Gameplay: Excellent
Stability: Acceptable
Story: Good
Controls: Excellent
Graphics: Acceptable
Music: Good
Sounds: Excellent
Difficulty: Outstanding

Notes: + (Positives), = (Small Gripes), - (Negatives)

+ Addicting gameplay for its genre
+ Great challenge for children or casual gamers
+ Fluent controls allow for precise clicking
+ Well done sound effects
+ Music fits the atmosphere of the environment
+ Superb backgrounds and 2D animation
+ Domino game provided to let you skip Hidden Object Scenes

= 3D cutscenes can be very hit or miss when it comes to movement
= The game can freeze if you click too quickly when loading the Hidden Object Scenes

- The facial movements for the 3D dialogue parts is laughably bad most of the time

Summary: A great addition to the Hidden Object Game (HOG) Genre by easily one of the best developers in the trade. The puzzles are good at keeping your brain active as well as an alternative domino game if those aren't your style. While it suffers from a rather cliche storyline, the scenery makes it worth it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198124770841', 'num_games_owned': 2744, 'num_reviews': 555, 'playtime_forever': 270, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 270, 'last_played': 1430671968}
review:
解谜版生化奇兵么==？海底销魂城rapture改伊甸城eden？小女孩和小阿妹？小女孩眼睛发红光而小阿妹发黄光？
另外明明是拯救未婚夫，介绍里咋成了未婚妻？
为了增加游戏时间厚颜无耻的来回跑，从地图的边缘跑到另一个地图的边缘。
通关后还有解锁的一章解谜，可以看看解锁电影，3d人模做的还挺上心。
其实做的很用心的解谜游戏。

author: {'steamid': '76561198139009356', 'num_games_owned': 1240, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 328, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 158, 'last_played': 1430492292}
review:
简单的说，点击式解谜游戏基本都是一个模型，寻找物品，解开谜题，玻璃用刀划，金属用酸溶，栅栏用气切，裂缝用锤砸，重要的物品都是在寻找11个无关物品之后才会给你，密码都是堂而皇之写在纸上而你需要做的不是去寻找密码而是去寻找输密码的方法，诸如此类的展开，玩的多了也就见怪不怪了。原则上，很难再这类游戏上找到很出彩的地方，一般比较破朔迷离的展开却总能迎来一个好莱坞式结局，最终的对手死于意外的概率超过90%。
《深渊：伊甸的幽灵》这部作品也不例外，游戏背景建立在一座海底城市：伊甸，曾经的繁华奇观吸引不少冒险家的驻足，而在一位冒险家神秘失踪之后，他的未婚妻毅然决然踏上了这条”寻夫之路“，不得不承认，游戏中部分场景的演出做的还是很有感觉的，但在几个装神弄鬼的桥段偶尔加速了玩家的心跳之后，他们很快发现这也不过就是找找找的变形：找开关，找钥匙，找阀门，找螺丝刀。而设计的小游戏也基本都是大家耳熟能详的，难见新意。游戏中隐藏物品寻找的替代游戏变成了类似于图案接力的”塔罗牌游戏“，比较容易上手，但很容易乏味，在打通一周目后，游戏会开启”特别故事“，讲述了在伊甸原住民的洛根的回忆，在短暂的探险中，玩家也能了解这位在正篇中给予主角很大帮助的人是何来历，这个部分需要点赞，人物塑造和场景安排也比正篇更加到位，至于其余的”壁纸下载“”小游戏重温“一类的设定，也只能说就是”看看而已“。
总的来说，这款游戏在同种类型里算是及格之作，但怎样做出新意，不能单单体现在画面和精心设计的成就系统上（顺带一提这款游戏想要打出全成就至少需要二周目）。剧情和谜题的设计才是重心，希望Artifex Mundi下一次有更好的表现。

author: {'steamid': '76561198158111668', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 196, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 196, 'last_played': 1417661911}

author: {'steamid': '76561198059372519', 'num_games_owned': 940, 'num_reviews': 95, 'playtime_forever': 264, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 260, 'last_played': 1565977963}
review:
Big Fish系ヒドゥンアイテムゲーム。CE版。
お姫様が攫われて、王子様が助けに行く！という物語が多いのですが、
このゲームでは、王子様（婚約者）が攫われて、お姫様（主人公）が助けに行くよ！と、
勇敢にもかつての海底都市へ飛び込んでいくお話。

同じ開発元の最近の作品の後にプレイすると、
グラフィックの質やパズルの種類、ムービーの量、
時折出現する謎翻訳（致命的なものはない）などなど、
ボリュームなどにも多少物足りなさが出るけれど、
そうでなければ気にならない程度じゃないかと。
短時間にさくっと遊べる手軽さが魅力。

author: {'steamid': '76561198093682052', 'num_games_owned': 2748, 'num_reviews': 80, 'playtime_forever': 235, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 235, 'last_played': 1429546380}
review: 9 clues后玩的第二部artifex社的avg游戏，与9 clues相比，主线剧情相差其实不大，不过解密元素更多，画面更好，值得肯定，最后还是要说artifex的游戏大同小异，玩完一部需要隔个半个月再玩下一部，这样不会感到略微厌烦~

author: {'steamid': '76561198002506911', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 415, 'playtime_forever': 596, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 520, 'last_played': 1428940660}
review:
Yet another great hidden object adventure game from Artifex Mundi.  While the story may not seem original, very Bioshock -esque, the story itself is good enough to keep you interested and also differs enough from Bioshock to keep it entertaining.  The graphics are beautiful with great animations and cut-scenes.  The puzzles can range from super simple to somewhat difficult.  The hidden object games aren't the most difficult that I've seen, but at least offer enough variety of objects to choose from that it's above par compared to other games of the genre.

Overall, this is one of the top of its kind, so definitely worth the play through.

author: {'steamid': '76561197975019981', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 3082, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1863, 'last_played': 1683593320}

author: {'steamid': '76561198120255809', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 104, 'playtime_forever': 481, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 481, 'last_played': 1428141196}
review:
Приветствую всех
Abyss: The Wraiths of Eden..
Отличная игра в жанре hidden object.
Рассмотрим плюсы данной игры:
1)Интересный и продуманный сюжет, развивающийся на фоне пустующего подводного города Эдем.
2)Множество интересных головоломок.
3)Атмосфера..атмосфера держит в напряжении на протяжении всей игры.
4)Хорошая визуальная и музыкальная составляющая игры.
Минусы:
1)Короткая.
Вывод: Качественный представитель своего жанра. Однозначно рекомендую)

10 крыс-легатов из 10

author: {'steamid': '76561198088784953', 'num_games_owned': 889, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 227, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 225, 'last_played': 1548849600}
review:
무려 공식 한글화된 퍼즐 게임입니다.

같은 제작사의 작품인 9 Clues(이하 9개의 단서로 칭함.)를 먼저 해보고 작성하는 평가인만큼 '9개의 단서'와 비교를 해보겠습니다.

우선 '9개의 단서'에 비해 그래픽 퀄리티가 높아졌습니다.
이벤트 씬에서는 캐릭터들이 거의 다 3D로 움직이며, 중간중간에 놀래키기 위한 컷씬의 삽입도 눈에 띄입니다.

그리고 퍼즐 난이도가 좀 더 상승하였습니다.
자체적인 난이도 3단계 분류 시스템은 그대로이지만, 퍼즐 자체의 난이도가 전체적으로 향상된 것이 눈에 띄입니다.
하지만 숨은 그림 찾기 같은 경우에는 도미노 퍼즐 시스템을 도입하여 숨은 그림 찾기가 어려울 경우 대체용으로 도미노 퍼즐을 통해 진행할 수 있게 만들었습니다.

좀 더 어드벤처성이 돋보이도록 맵을 넓혀서 여기저기 열심히 돌아다녀야 됩니다.
그러나 맵 구조가 의외로 넓어서 진행을 위한 길 찾기가 조금 힘듭니다.

하지만 '9개의 단서'에 비해 퍼즐 난이도가 상승했어도 캐쥬얼 퍼즐 게임이라는 장르에 맞게 과도하게 복잡한 퍼즐은 넣지 않은 듯 합니다.

'9개의 단서'를 플레이해봤고 어드벤처성이 조금 아쉬웠거나 좀 더 어려운 퍼즐을 원하시는 분들께 추천.

author: {'steamid': '76561198114106289', 'num_games_owned': 6484, 'num_reviews': 176, 'playtime_forever': 292, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 292, 'last_played': 1427624153}
review:
[h1][i]간단하면서도 편안한 조합퍼즐[/i][/h1]

[h1]장점[/h1]

+캐쥬얼한 퍼즐들
+상황에 잘 맞는 사운드들
+게임 몰입에 도움을 주는 컷신


[h1]단점[/h1]

-간단한 퍼즐
-판타지적인 스토리
-저렴한 모바일버전


[h1]주의점[/h1]

이 배급사 게임은 다 비슷비슷합니다.


[h1]이런 분들에게 추천합니다.[/h1]

골머리 앓지 않고 편안히 푸는 퍼즐이 좋으신 분


[h1]이런 분들에게 비추천합니다.[/h1]

보다 어려운 퍼즐이 좋으신 분
모바일버전으로 플레이하실 분

author: {'steamid': '76561198124275446', 'num_games_owned': 1852, 'num_reviews': 70, 'playtime_forever': 247, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 247, 'last_played': 1427432224}
review:
Let me start off this review by saying that I'm not too well-versed in hidden object games (yet). I played a free-to-play hidden object game years ago and remembered liking it well enough. I love finding things in games. Anything. Collectibles, secret areas, shinies, etc. Heck, I love searching for and finding things in real life, too. I'm a married woman and I still insist on my mother hiding my Easter basket every year. I'm not sure what's sadder; that my mother actually listens to me and hides my basket every year, or that she still gives me one at all.

Nonetheless, thanks to the Steam queue, I have been introduced to the genre yet again. I purchased a few on a whim one day, and Abyss: The Wraiths of Eden was the first I played. I was in a casual game type of mood after putting much thought and effort into a lengthy RPG, and this game was really enjoyable in that respect. 

The game opens up with your character's voice laying out the prologue to the story, and it made me giggle a bit because she sounded like a generic Microsoft computer voice at first. While the environments in this are beautiful and colorful, the entire game has a type of B-movie feel, with iffy voice actors, a "meh" story, and no sense of danger at all. The game definitely tries to throw some creepy moments at you, but never did I feel like my character was in danger or that a save would need to be reloaded. The game isn't scary at all for adults, but for young kids, it might be sufficiently creepy on rare occasions (and this game is definitely E-rated).

Abyss surprised me in that the game, while in the Hidden Object genre, was not overflowing with hidden object puzzles. I saw one review mention there were too many of them, but I wished for more. The game relies on an exceptionally well done and intelligently designed point and click adventure model for most of the gameplay, and the hidden object screens are mostly a distraction that include an object or two that you'll need to take from the hidden object puzzle and insert into the story gameplay. Sprinkled throughout the game there are also various mini-puzzles that go from sliding puzzles to jigsaw types to wire connecting puzzles. Not once did I feel like a puzzle was out of place or overly complicated. Even if (say, for kids) a puzzle is too confusing or hard, you can skip it. The game encourages you not to via some unlockable achievements, but it is an option. Unlike many point and click games, I never felt like combining objects to meet a goal was unnecessarily complicated. All of them made sense, so this game never frustrates.

Overall, while I did wish for more hidden object puzzles, I felt like Abyss: The Wraiths of Eden surprised me in its quality. It's relaxing and takes you on a nice little journey over about a four hour playthrough (I played on Expert despite being fairly new to the genre and never once was frustrated, so it's definitely casual!). While I would personally advise you to wait for a sale because I go by the $1.00 per hour of gameplay rule, I definitely recommend this game to anyone looking for a casual romp through some pretty environments. I'm giving this a 7/10. This is a great game for kids or for adults looking for a shorter game with little commitment. I was pleasantly surprised with this game, and I now consider myself a fan of the Hidden Object genre.

review:
Do you like the sort of games where you have to find items 'hidden' in a mass of other items tied loosely into a story line? If so this is the game for you. 

Whoever designed the puzzles are geniuses, its simple enough that nearly anyone above 12 can solve them but complex enough to not require a reset regardless of how the player randomly clicks bar 1 or 2.

Not recommended if you are looking for a challenge.

author: {'steamid': '76561198064445036', 'num_games_owned': 1447, 'num_reviews': 168, 'playtime_forever': 316, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 206, 'last_played': 1426119598}
review:
Was ist Abyss: The Wraiths of Eden? Ein Wimmelbild Spiel welches starke Einflüsse von H.P. Lovecraft hat. Warum starke Einflüsse? Es erinnert mich an die Geschicht “der Tempel” von ebend erwähnten Lovecraft, ausserdem ist die Geschichte auch stark mit dem Cthulhu-Myhtos verbunden. Die Spielmechanik ist halt wie in jedem dieser Spiele, finde A und bringe es zu B, was mit Minispielen und halt Wimmelbildern aufgelockert wird. Was man auf jedenfall noch erwähnen muss ist das es verschiedene Schwierigkeitsstufen gibt, ein Bonuslevel und man kann jedes Wimmelbild nochmal extra im Menü auswählen und erneut spielen. Mehr gibt es nicht zu sagen, die Geschichte ist in Ordnung, hat einige Schockmomente, welche bei mir aber nicht zündeten und die Grafik ist für so ein Spiel mehr als in Ordnung. In diesem Sinne Daumen auf jedenfall hoch.

Abyss von TNA gibt es hier:http://www.twitch.tv/thebenjaminkendrick

author: {'steamid': '76561198067299072', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 276, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 276, 'last_played': 1426096974}
review:
「ナイトメア・フロム・ザ・ディープ」と同系のアイテム探しアドベンチャー。本作はアニメーションがド派手になって画面全体がぐりぐり動く。親切なヘルプシステム・ロマンティックなＢＧＭ・平凡だがデザインの良いミニパズル・肩透かしのアイテム探しなどはシリーズ共通で、気軽に四、五時間つぶしたい人にはうってつけの内容になっている。
今回は本格ＳＦっぽい舞台設定や演出で格調高い雰囲気をまとっているのだが、アドベンチャー部分はカジュアルゲームそのもののチープな展開が続くため逆にコミカルに感じられてしまうのは欠点かも知れない。日本語ローカライズも丹念にされているのに一部に重症の誤訳があったりフォントの違和感が目立ったりと、何かとアンバランスな印象が強くて勿体ない気がした。
ま、肩の力を抜いて遊べば価格相応に楽しめるゲームかと。マップを見るのと見ないのとでは難易度に雲泥の差がつくので、サクッと一周回りたい人は操作可能地点の分かる「アドバンス」、じっくりアドベンチャーを楽しみたい人は「エキスパート」で始めることをオススメします。

author: {'steamid': '76561198125686082', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 70, 'playtime_forever': 482, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 482, 'last_played': 1426236977}

author: {'steamid': '76561198049101018', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 144, 'playtime_forever': 288, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 102, 'last_played': 1425246415}
review: El juego está bastante bien. Es suficientemente largo, los puzzles no son excesivamente fáciles, el capítulo extra no sobra y te sorprende porque piensas que va a ser la continuación de la historia, pero no... El mapa ayuda bastante, pero ayudaría más si tuvieses accesos directos en vez de tener que dar tanta vuelta. Se dificulta un poco jugarlo en español porque la traducción DE LOS NOMBRES DE LOS OBJETOS a veces es bastante lamentable, y se nota sobre todo en las EOO, me ha sido imposible completarlas todas porque no sé qué objeto estoy buscando, el nombre que le han puesto es desconocido para mí en mi idioma (y yo sé inglés, es un problema de mala traducción). Pero bueno, como ya he dicho, en general está bastante bien, es entretenido, engancha y se disfruta.

author: {'steamid': '76561198076888673', 'num_games_owned': 377, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 267, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 258, 'last_played': 1457930737}
review:
Esse jogo foi a minha grande fuga dos jogos mais aventureiros que dominam o mercado hoje em dia. Apesar de ser um jogo relativamente bem curto, te coloca para quebrar a cabeça e raciocinar bastante em cada cena que é passada. O jogo se passa no fundo do mar, aonde uma mulher, vai em busca do seu noivo (Robert) que saiu para dar uma "passeada" no fundo do mar e acabou não voltando, nesse passeio, ela acha uma um submarino naufragado, entra e assim é arrastada para literalmente o fundo do mar junto com ele, a partir dai, tudo começa.

O objetivo principal do jogo é achar Robert, mas com essa busca ela acaba descobrindo várias coisas, incluindo uma ameaça, criando assim objetivos distintos. O seu único comando é com o mouse, clicando nos cenários para achar itens e resolver os quebra cabeças do jogo para assim seguir adiante. Tenho uma certa facilidade com jogos puzzle e Hidden Object, mas tenho que assumir, tiveram momentos que eu não sabia para onde correr hahaha

Aconselho jogar em modo avançado, para que o jogo não fique tão fácil, afinal, no modo iniciante, ele basicamente entrega aonde você deve clicar para seguir em frente, tornando assim o jogo bem fraco. Não posso deixar de ressaltar, sou fraco para sustos e jogos de terror, então não me usem como parâmetro, mas conseguir saltar da cadeira umas três ou quatro vezes. Sem mais, o jogo ta valendo cada centavo gasto!

author: {'steamid': '76561198011478984', 'num_games_owned': 2007, 'num_reviews': 217, 'playtime_forever': 257, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 257, 'last_played': 1424948788}
review:
这是通关的第11个steam游戏了。也是Artifex Mundi出品的指指点点的解谜游戏。还记得深海恶梦三部曲麽，这作里面有个医务室墙上一张图就是深海恶梦的一个场景，算是彩蛋吧。
看了下时间，这作是12年的，比上次吐槽的时间之谜2晚了一年，果然制作水平上去了，剧情啊谜题的设置比较合理，让人玩的顺畅了，不过这作在大地图上不能点击地点来移动，算是个缺憾，尤其是那个电梯。不过也是剧情需要，后期的话有的场景会被堵过不去，而且有的时候需要一步步走过去触发剧情。
游戏还是个英勇的女主角（貌似玩到现在都是女的主角），为了救男友，勇闯海底城。原来叫做“伊甸”的海底城，现在已经被恶魔占领了，然后女主一路闯关，最后重新设立法阵，封印恶魔，救出男友。 就不吐槽steam的介绍是救未婚妻了，整个剧情简洁流畅，谜题设置合理，道具也很直观，基本上遇到什么就能自己想到“啊，这个东西我能这样解”。最后，自带中文就是好。

author: {'steamid': '76561198047232560', 'num_games_owned': 1998, 'num_reviews': 140, 'playtime_forever': 240, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 240, 'last_played': 1424803525}
review:
Plusy:

+ klimatyczna
+ przyjemna rozgrywka
+ dodatkowa przygoda
+ nie najgorsza fabuła
+ dobry poziom oprawy audiowizualnej
+ osiągnięcia wydłużające rozgrywkę

Minusy:

- krótka
- babolki językowe w filmikach (napis na drzwiach windy po angielsku w filmiku, a jak już się skończy scenka to gwałtownie zmienia się na polski)
- animacje nie powalają

Ocena: 7+/10

author: {'steamid': '76561197993474518', 'num_games_owned': 813, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 293, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 293, 'last_played': 1399660292}
review:
Wimmelbildtime ^^

Wer Wimmelbildspiele mag , wird dieses Spiel natürlich mögen. Ist sogar eins mit einer sehr netten Geschichte, die ein wenig Bioshock Atmosphäre entwickelt.

Grafik und Sound sind für ein Wimmelbildspiel schon ziemlich gut. 

Und da ich Wimmelbildspiele für zwischendurch sehr gerne spiele , bekommt Abyss: The Wraiths of Eden eine klare Kaufempfehlung :)

Ziemlich oft Wimmelbild in diesem kleinen Text :)


http://rocketbeans.tv/

author: {'steamid': '76561198023323444', 'num_games_owned': 1672, 'num_reviews': 68, 'playtime_forever': 745, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 258, 'last_played': 1648285191}
review:
I didn't play many HOPA games but I enjoy this one alot so far.

UPDATE:
I stopped playing this game for some real-life reasons, but I started it again today and finished it.
Here are my thoughts:

+ Beautiful art style
+ Very good puzzles
+ It can either put your brain to work or give you hints if you don't want to
+ Good story
+ Keeps you engaged
+ Nice music

- IMO the ending was a bit sudden. Not a big deal tho

TLDR: I recommend it whole-heartedly

author: {'steamid': '76561198007943969', 'num_games_owned': 2219, 'num_reviews': 73, 'playtime_forever': 569, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 569, 'last_played': 1424038883}
review: Rozpoczynając kolejną grę produkcji Artifex Mundi, a mając już za sobą jeden z ich tytułów człowiek wie, czego się może spodziewać. A są to : bardzo dobrze graficznie wykonana produkcja, niezła fabuła i ciekawe puzzle. Gra się bardzo przyjemnie, czas mija szybko, w kilka godzin można zrobić pełne achievementy, natomiast żeby wymaksować, to już trzeba dwukrotnie przejść grę, dla chcącego nic trudnego :) Zdecydowanie polecam kolejny tytuł AM.

author: {'steamid': '76561197991991520', 'num_games_owned': 9604, 'num_reviews': 68, 'playtime_forever': 352, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 352, 'last_played': 1424024944}
review: Atmosféra lehce připomíná Bioshock :-) Klasická HOPA od  Artifex Mundi. Mám je rád. Pěkné grafické, hudební i příběhové zpracování. Puzzly tentokráte lehké, achievementy taky. A klasika - na 100% je to nutné dohrát 2x.

author: {'steamid': '76561198110932771', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 516, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 516, 'last_played': 1423817163}
review:
하루종일 플레이해서 엔딩 봄 ㅇㅅ;ㅇ 
역시 재밌었다. 

막히는 부분에서 왔다갔다하느라고 속 터지는 부분도 없잖아 있었지만, 
결국 찬스를 써버리는 바람에 도전과제 모음은 무리였지만, 
그래도 재밌었음.

힌트인지 함정인지 모를, 숨은그림찾기의 목록도 여전했고!

다만 이 회사 시리즈가 본래 폰겜으로 나온 만큼, 
나처럼 컴으로 줄곧 잡고 깨는 것보다 패드나 폰 같은 이동용 기기로 
남는 시간에 조금씩하면 더 좋을 거 같다. 

이번 명절, 밀리는 차안에서 하면 꿀잼일 듯 ㅇㅅ<

에덴이라는 바다 밑 도시의 모습이 바숔1 시작할 때 배경과 비슷한 느낌이어서 더 반가웠음.

author: {'steamid': '76561198048277740', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 442, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 442, 'last_played': 1418689465}
review: Un juego de puzzles,en ubicaciones submarinas,con una dificultad bien ajustada y equilibrada.

author: {'steamid': '76561198127797386', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 603, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 470, 'last_played': 1423430095}
review:
На первый взгляд - обычная бродилка с головоломками и поиском предметов. Но. 
Первое же, что очаровывает в Бездне - музыка. Мягкая, атмосферная, одновременно успокаивает и расслабляет, создает впечатление, что находишься реально на глубине. Далее идет вполне неплохая для игры такого жанра графика, цвета яркие, сочные, но глаз не режет. Мимика лиц подкачала, но это уже дело десятое. От легатов этих в первые моменты действительно шарахаешься, да и сюжет в принципе заставляет попотеть, пока разберешься, что к чему. 
Мини-игры порадовали разнообразием и, при этом, оказались не шибко сложными: действительно подумать пришлось разве что над сценой со свечами ближе к концу и камерой в бонусной игре. 
Из минусов можно назвать лифт. Пока доберешься, куда тебе надо - забудешь, за чем, собственно, туда пошел. 
9/10 ставлю смело и отношу к любимым играм.)

author: {'steamid': '76561198126733109', 'num_games_owned': 274, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 886, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 601, 'last_played': 1600087166}
review:
"Abyss" hat eine schöne Grafik und eine angenehme Storyline, der man gut folgen kann.
Man kann zwischen drei Spielmodi wählen - leicht, mittel, schwer - und je nachdem, für welchen Schwierigkeitsgrad man sich entscheidet, ist das Spiel eben unterschiedlich schnell.

Ich selbst habe das Spiel auf "mittel" gespielt und auch wenn viele der Bereiche noch angezeigt wurden, mit denen man interagieren konnte, war es zeitweise eine Frickelarbeit, die richtigen Stellen zu finden, wo es nun weiter geht.
Im Vergleich zu anderen Wimmelbildspielen, liegt die Grafik bei Abyss bzw. bei allen Spielen des Herstellers im oberen Bereich, sowohl die Szenen, als auch die Filmsequenzen - alles wirkt stimmig, nichts ruckelt.

Das Einzige, was schade ist, ist die teilweise mangelhafte Übersetzung, bei der man teilweise um viele Ecken denken muss, oder sich einfach durch eine Wimmelbildszene klicken muss, weil der gesuchte Gegenstand falsch übersetzt wurde. Diesen Mangel machen aber die wunderschöne Grafik und das Sounddesign wieder wett.

Ich kann ideses Spiel leidenschaftlichen Wimmelbildspielern nur empfehlen.

author: {'steamid': '76561198071190201', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 401, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 401, 'last_played': 1423146706}
review:
Abyss: The Wraiths of Eden ist ein Puzzle/Wimmelspiel bild für mich diente es eher als abwechslung von Shootern und anderen genres hatte aber dennoch ne menge Spaß damit. Manche Rätsel forderten meinen grips doch dann gab es eher einfachere bis vorraussehende rätsel. Abyss : The Wraiths of Eden ist jetzt nicht einer der besten seines genres aber durchaus für fans dieses genres einen blick wert kann ich nur empfehlen.

Wertung nach Schulnote: 2-

author: {'steamid': '76561198050478086', 'num_games_owned': 1672, 'num_reviews': 156, 'playtime_forever': 84, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 84, 'last_played': 1407699171}
review:
This game is a mix of an adventure and casual puzzle game , constantly you encounter different puzzles to solve like match the cable figure patterns, find all the hidden objects or how to turn off the electricity, like most puzzle games it doesn't make sense where you find the item you need to grab the other item but who cares?.
The game offers a few hours of fun for just 8$, the story is about finding your lost fiance in the underwater city of Eden, you might notice how Eden resembles a little on bioshock's rapture, underwater city ruined?, but nothing else in common.

author: {'steamid': '76561197992461075', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 59, 'playtime_forever': 484, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 484, 'last_played': 1415650052}
review:
Un juego típico de buscar objetos escondidos, casi una aventura gráfica.

La trama es bastante profunda, al menos más de lo que esperaba en este tipo de títulos (aunque los gráficos 3D hecho en fotos chirrían un poco).

Si lo encontráis de oferta (o aún mejor en un pack con otros juegos parecidos) y os gusta el género no dudéis.

author: {'steamid': '76561198101802351', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 184, 'playtime_forever': 437, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 437, 'last_played': 1417780366}
review:
[h1]Добро пожаловать в [strike]Восторг[/strike] Эдем![/h1]

Abyss: The Wraiths of Eden - еще одна хорошая игра в жанре hidden object от Artifex Mundi. В этот раз мы отправляемся в  заброшенный город Эдем, находящийся глубоко под толщей океана. Играем мы, как всегда, девушкой, которой предстоит спасти своего жениха и жителей города, победив древнее зло, которое случайно было разбужено самими обитателями подводного рая. В целом могу сказать, что сюжет довольно неплох, хоть он почти полностью состоит из уже известных идей из других игр.

В геймплейном плане что-то описывать почти нет смысла - стандартный поиск предметов и головоломки, соотношение которых к друг другу подобрано весьма удачно, что позволяет игре не надоедать однообразными задачами. Графически игра выглядит хорошо (для игры своего жанра), однако анимация лиц персонажей подкачала, что, впрочем, не столь важно. Еще одним минусом игры можно считать отсутствие быстрого перехода по карте, который здесь очень бы пригодился из-за лифта, на котором приходится ездить очень часто и тратить на него много времени.

[i]В целом - годная игра для любителей жанра, а также для тех, кто ищет простую игру для отдыха и/или получения всех достижений. 6,5/10[/i]

author: {'steamid': '76561198138413873', 'num_games_owned': 414, 'num_reviews': 44, 'playtime_forever': 279, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 279, 'last_played': 1422193991}

author: {'steamid': '76561198045200324', 'num_games_owned': 772, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 452, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 452, 'last_played': 1434753879}
review:
[h1]Um incrível desafio no fundo do mar![/h1]
Um problema do cara ter muitos jogos é que passo mais tempo escolhendo um jogo do que jogando eles então peguei o primeiro da lista e achei esse ótimo jogo, me fez lembrar dos meus tempos de PC da Positivo e que só jogava jogos de "Objeto Oculto" e posso dizer que foi uma ótima ideia jogá-lo.
        
[i]Obs: Se quiser ler o resumo da análise pule direto para "Considerações Finais".[/i]

[b]◄ Estória / Objetivo ►[/b]
	[quote=] Tome bastante fôlego e encontre sua noiva desaparecida no abismo negro do oceano. Descubra e investigue uma esquecida cidade submersa construída em um intrigante estilo art-déco. Esta antiga utopia esconde muitos segredos arrepiantes e forças sobrenaturais, cujos resquícios ainda se ocultam em cada canto. Enfrente o antigo mal que está se escondendo nas profundezas das câmaras da cidade do Éden. [/quote]
Com essa premissa, a estória de [i]Profundezas: Os Fantasmas do Eden[/i] é um tanto quanto clichê mas boa o suficiente para te manter interessado, algo que muitos Hiden Objects falham em proporcionar. Algo importante a se notar: Interface, legendas, textos (incluindo texturas) todos em PT-BR!

Para quem curte, as conquistas proporcionam ainda o fator replay. A estória principal e todos os puzzles giram em torno de 3 a 4 horas dependendo de como jogado, já com as conquistas esse tempo sobe para 6 ou 7 horas.

[b]◄ Jogabilidade / Controles ►[/b]
Junte os gêneros "Apontar e Clicar" e "Objeto Oculto" o jogo não apresenta muitas difículdades pois os puzzles são muito fáceis de resolver, algo que pode agradar tanto jogador mais familiarizado com o gênero quanto novatos.

O game consiste apenas em clicar em portas/passagens para se movimentar através dos cenários, interagir com objetos e resolver puzzles divesificados. Existem 3 tipos de puzzles:
[list]
 [*]Objetos Ocultos: Como o próprio nome diz, procurar em determinado cenário os objetos ocultos listados;
 [*]Dominó: Você pode optar de ao invés de resolver o desafio dos objetos ocultos, jogar um jogo de dominó;
 [*]Mini Games: em certos pontos do jogo você precisará resolver certos puzzles para prosseguir com a história;
[/list]
[b]◄ Gráficos / Visuais ►[/b]
É incrivel que jogos de produtoras indies [u]na maioria[/u] das vezes conseguem nos cativar com seus visuais e traços belíssimos, [i]Profundezas: Os Fantasmas do Eden[/i] teve um capricho incrível por parte da "Artifex Mundi sp. z o.o.".

A ambientação da cidade no fundo do mar é magnifica! Quem já jogou ou já viu imagens, é praticamente impossível não comparar determinados lugares com o famoso e glorioso [i]Bioshock[/i] (que ainda pretendo jogar), como por exemplo [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=361720668]essa screenshot[/url] tirada em um elevador logo no início do game. Inclusive veja outras análises, vão falar a mesma coisa.

Um problema que presenciei, algumas texturas que contém texto demoram para carregar de vez em quando do inglês para o português. 
Animações da boca dos personagens ao falar são extremamente bizarras, teria sido bem melhor deixar sem animação do que fazer o personagem ter uma animação robótica na boca.

[b]◄ Efeitos Sonoros / Soundtrack ►[/b]
Os efeitos sonoros foram bem implementados, você realmente se sente em uma instalação submarina e passa a sensação de um lugar misterioso e assustador.
Assim como os efeitos sonoros, trilha sonora é muito boa, se ajusta a atmosfera assustadora do lugar.

A dublagem não é lá grandes coisas, não passam a emoção que tem que passar em determinadas cenas.

[b]◄ Multiplayer Local / Multiplayer Online ►[/b]
O jogo não possui nenhum tipo de multiplayer, seja local ou online.

[b]◄ DLCs / Expansões ►[/b]
Já incluído na compra do game vem um conteúdo adicional que pode ser acessado através do menu "Extras", trata-se de uma história que ocorre bem antes dos acontecimentos da história principal onde é mostrado e falado mais sobre essa misteriosa Cidade.

[h1]Considerações Finais[/h1]
[b]Prós:[/b]
+ Enredo interesante;
+ Interface, legendas e textos em PT-BR;
+ Horas de gameplay até grande para o gênero;
+ Conquistas aumentam o fator replay;
+ Controles simples;
+ Diversidade de puzzles;
+ Visuais belíssimos;
+ Efeitos sonoros bem implementados;
+ Trilha sonora se ajusta a atmosfera assustadora;
+ Estória adicional já inclusa;

[b]Contras:[/b]
- Demora de renderização de algumas texturas;
- Animação da boca do personagem ao falar bizarras;
- Dublagem muito simples;

[b]Nota Final: 7.7/10[/b]

Experiência agradável, certamente voltarei a jogar jogos desse gênero, é uma boa dica para quem quer fugir dos gêneros mais comuns. Recomendo para quem gosta do gênero e principalmente para quem quer experimentar pela primeira vez.

Mas apesar da qualidade, não acho que o jogo vale o preço cheio de R$15,99. Recomendo pegar em alguma promoção de pelo menos 50%.

[url=http://steamcommunity.com/id/MestreJuninho/screenshots/?appid=284710]Clique aqui para conferir algumas Screenshots.[/url]

[list]
    [*]26/04/2015: Correcão de erros de português e mudança de estrutura.
    [*]22/06/2015: Correções de concordância e adições de comentários.
[/list][/i]

author: {'steamid': '76561198055451405', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 154, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 154, 'last_played': 1421792856}

author: {'steamid': '76561198121018137', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 1330, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1330, 'last_played': 1421722956}
review: An enjoyable, if a bit monotonous game.  I suppose this is to be expected from this genre, which is a new one to me.  The story is adequately suspenseful, though predictable.  I found the wordplay involving the hidden object games amusing and often clever.  The one problem I have with the game, and this is near a deal breaker for me, to be the voice acting of the main character.  Her tone constantly seems overly cheerful or questioning, and the voice itself has almost no character or depth to it.  At one point, when she encounters a sea ghost, the last of whose kind imprisoned and then attempted to murder her, she exclaims, in a flirty quip, "What's your game?"  His game is to kill you!  Why aren't you scared?  This would only be a minor fault, where it not for the fact that this robo-woman is tasked with half of the dialogue in the game.  In the end, I was forced to add my own excitement to the character.  Picturing her as a lovesick psychopath, intent on gaining the pleasure of killing her beloved Robert for herself, she wanders an abandoned sea-station, laughing at the impotent attempts of sea-ghosts to scare her.  Psycho-Grade = B-

author: {'steamid': '76561197975565526', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 411, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 411, 'last_played': 1421584802}
review:
He jugado a la mayoría de aventuras de Artifex Mundi con mi hija de 6 años y nunca me defraudan. Historias originales con grandes dosis de misterio y toques sobrenaturales, pero apto para públicos muy jóvenes. No hay nada de mal gusto que les pueda estropear la experiencia.

Los problemas que plantea la aventura se resuelven con la típica mecánica de usar los objetos que vas encontrando en las distintas pantallas. En el inventario nunca llega a haber muchos objetos a la vez, lo que simplifica mucho las soluciones. Tampoco es necesario combinar objetos entre sí para crear nuevas herramientas. No hay opciones de diálogo como en otro tipo de aventuras, pero sí muchos puzzles, y muy currados, tanto que los más pequeños no serán capaces de resolver la mayoría por sí solos. No pueden faltar tampoco los juegos de "Objetos Ocultos", un imprescindible de este tipo de aventuras sencillas, que aunque no plantean un gran reto, son muy atractivos para los niños.

Absolutamente todos los juegos de Artifex Mundi, a pesar de estar orientados a un público no muy exigente, rezuman buen gusto por todos lados, y este Abyss no es una excepción. El arte del juego es sobresaliente y cada estancia está llena de detalles. Los enigmas son sencillos pero no estúpidos, y todas las soluciones tienen mucho sentido, no habiendo nada absurdo o ilógico.

La duración del juego no suele ir más allá de las 5 ó 6 horas si juegas con niños. Si eres un jugador experimentado y te enfrentas solo a un juego de este tipo (no sé muy bien por qué querrías hacer tal cosa) seguramente no te lleve más de 3 ó 4 horas.

Lo recomiendo sin dudar, teniendo en cuenta a qué público está dirigido, y sobre todo al precio tan reducido que sueles encontrarlo en Steam.

author: {'steamid': '76561198128540844', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 176, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 176, 'last_played': 1421226854}
review:
剧情想的一般，和大部分解谜一样都是封印恶魔的。
不过CG做的挺良心，人物的动作动画做的非常圆润，就是表情太僵硬太猎奇了。
流程略短，不过成就挺多的，找物品的时候还有另外一种游戏模式。
缺点是不能点地图转换场景，这点在地图大了之后很不方便。
而且电梯有3层却没有设计可以选择哪一层，简直麻烦！
总的来说是个比较良心的作品，值得尝试。

author: {'steamid': '76561198117399271', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 99, 'playtime_forever': 5240, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4670, 'last_played': 1558737163}
review: I'm not going to offer any theories as to whether this whole thing should be legally actionable, but setting potential plagiarism aside, Abyss is a high-quality hidden object game more than enough content to keep anyone entertained.

author: {'steamid': '76561198011726945', 'num_games_owned': 211, 'num_reviews': 131, 'playtime_forever': 309, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 309, 'last_played': 1420926518}
review:
After my experience with Enigmatis 2 it was pretty obvious that it wasn't the last Artifex Mundi game I played, but since the first Enigmatis game wasn't released at that time yet, I got the game which seemed the most interesting instead and that was this one.
Judging by the voice actor we're controlling the same character who this time takes a dive into the sea to find her love who had gone missing, only to discover an...aaand that's where I stop, don't wanna spoil that one for you, but still to give a point to this review I think that the story is just as good as it was in Enigmatis 2 while the gameplay is almost completely the same with some very minor design differences.
It has the atmosphere, the challenge factor (which I found noticeably harder regarding the "100%ing" in terms of achievements which I gave up on this time xD) and some replay value as well, just like in the other game.

It's one of those cases when you have a well working recipe for a good experience and the only thing you have to do is to make very minor changes, just to give this other experience it's own identity, nothing else. 

In other words, play this one if you prefer underwater environments and abandoned places to chilling forests. I personally prefer Enigmatis 2 over this one so far, but ONLY because of the environments, nothing else. 
In terms of everything else, it's just as good as that game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198079017859', 'num_games_owned': 1174, 'num_reviews': 122, 'playtime_forever': 254, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 254, 'last_played': 1420880296}
review:
Cons:
-Wooden voice acting and emotionless characters (especially your character, who is apparently dead to all emotion, including fear)
-Poor translation to English in places (notably for the names of certain items in hidden objects scenes)
-Repetitive music that gets annoying pretty quickly
-Standard nonsensical progression (ie there are thin vines blocking a puzzle which you can't pull off with your hands or cut with scissors or a knife; you have to wait until you have the hedge clippers)
-Standard hackneyed plot
-Puzzles are too easy
-Game has zero replay value, yet in order to get all achievements you must play it all the way through at least twice

Pros:
+The entire cast of characters is made up of what appear to be outdated animatronic puppets with terrifying faces and dead eyes to match their wooden voices. It's like playing through a ride at Universal Studios, about 20 years ago.

author: {'steamid': '76561198110604083', 'num_games_owned': 1059, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 346, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 346, 'last_played': 1420820007}

author: {'steamid': '76561198155569683', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 434, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 434, 'last_played': 1415196285}
review:
Ein graphisch sehr schön gestaltetes Point- und Click-Adventure. Die Wimmelbild und Logik-Rätsel sind nicht besonders anspruchsvoll, man kommt ohne große Schwierigkeiten durch das Spiel. 
Was mich ein wenig gestört hat waren die menschlichen Darsteller in den Videosequenzen. Ganz ehrlich, die fand ich "gruseliger" als die eigentlichen Schockmomente zwischendurch.
Aber davon abgesehen bietet es einige Stunden atmosphärische Unterhaltung.

review: Interesting story, nice puzzles. A game is long too.

review: Jeśli lubisz Hidden Object Puzzle Adwenture to ta gra jest dla ciebie obowiązkowa. Świetna grafika, nawiązania do Lovecrafta, gra się świetnie i można ją ukończyć w 5h. Jedna z lepszych w tym gatunku, a do tego zrobiona przez polskich twórców. Brawo!

author: {'steamid': '76561198004372851', 'num_games_owned': 762, 'num_reviews': 210, 'playtime_forever': 618, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 535, 'last_played': 1451787914}
review:
Artifix Mundi games have their hammy moments, but these games are very easy to play with my wife and are a nice bonding experience.  Voice actors are reused game to game, and the mouth movements look like the same technology used in "Fallout 2" but they are fund games.  Abyss is designed well with appropriate music, sound, and level design, the only major problem is the elevator to navigate floors takes is frustrating when you're trying to find the magic pile of hidden objects to click on.

7/10 - A good game to initiate people into the hidden object genre.

author: {'steamid': '76561197974226436', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 1347, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1347, 'last_played': 1420067748}
review:
I'll give this one a recommendation, though a warning as well.  You can complete the game, including all achievements, in about half an hour.  3-5 hours would be more realistic.  Buy it when it's on sale.

It's pretty blatent about ripping off Bioshock's milieau, but it's a completely different game type and plot, so oh well.

It's also not consistent with it's time settings - things like modern car keys, thumb drives and such mixed in with the older look of Bioshock, a bit jarring to me.

author: {'steamid': '76561198090268928', 'num_games_owned': 2935, 'num_reviews': 148, 'playtime_forever': 554, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 554, 'last_played': 1419979843}

author: {'steamid': '76561197971074683', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 99, 'playtime_forever': 493, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 493, 'last_played': 1419728321}
review: This game was solid. Heavier on puzzles than hidden object and the domino HO alternative was interesting. Absolute unabashed rip-off of the Bioshock environment but the story (iffy as it was) was not a copy. In order to get all of the achievements, you have to play at least twice (once for all the HO and once for all the Domino). All in all very solid even if the story was not amazing.

author: {'steamid': '76561198011595325', 'num_games_owned': 2477, 'num_reviews': 929, 'playtime_forever': 531, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 516, 'last_played': 1419738503}
review:
Mais um jogo da produtora de 9 Clues que peguei em um bundle, e é igual aos outros jogos de franquia no quesito do modo "ache o item", os puzzles obviamente são diferentes, jogo bom para passar o tempo, ou para pessoas que gostam de jogatina mais tranquila. A historia é um pouco clichê, mas um pouco interessante, se assemelhando em muitos aspectos a famosa franquia Bioshock - só que em point and click. 
--------------------------------------------------
Another game from the makersof 9 Clues that I got in a bundle, and is equal to other franchise games in the question of the  "find the item" thing, the puzzles are obviously different, good game to pass the time, or for people who love more "quiet and slow" gaming. The story is a bit cliché, but also a little interesting, resembling in many respects the famous franchise Bioshock - but in point and click mode.

author: {'steamid': '76561198071690884', 'num_games_owned': 120, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 310, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 310, 'last_played': 1419041432}
review:
Um ótimo jogo!

Ele não é demorado, podendo ser fechado em 2 horas. 

A arte do jogo é ótima, chega a dar bons sustos em alguns momentos.

É um jogo point and click, então não espere interações com todo o cenário.

A história cativa, apesar de não ser tão original, mas conforme jogamos, queremos ir cada vez mais fundo para resolver os mistérios.

Super recomendado.

author: {'steamid': '76561197971043455', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 77, 'playtime_forever': 542, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 542, 'last_played': 1439071455}
review:
Loved it! Great atmosphere, nice puzzles, could have been longer. Hope there will be a sequel! :)

Only downside: when you have played other games from this studio, you are getting a bit annoyed by the constant recycling of character faces and use of the same voice actors in their games.

author: {'steamid': '76561198072110088', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 125, 'playtime_forever': 304, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 304, 'last_played': 1419625842}
review:
Abyss: The Wraiths of Eden ist ein Wimmelbildspiel, dass in einer Unterwasserwelt spielt. In rund 3 Stunden Spielzeit muss man seinen vermissten Freund suchen, retten und aus dem vermeindlichem Paradies flüchten. 
Es hat mir von der Atmosphäre und der Umgebung her sehr gut gefallen, es wirkt etwas ausgefallener, als andere Spiele von Artifex Mundi. Der Soundtrack fügte sich gut ein und untermalte das ganze.
Lediglich viele falsache Objektbezeichnungen haben mich in den Wahnsinn getrieben, hier hat die "Übersetzungsabteilung" sehr schlampig gearbeitet. Ich sllte einen "Baseballschläger" finden und das Objekt, was tatsächlich gesucht wurde war eine (lebendige) Fledermaus. Die Minispiele hingegen liefen wie geschmiert.
Die Steam-Erfolge kann man in 2 Durchgängen erledigen, wegen der Dominospiele-Erfolge. Dauert das Spiel beim ersten Mal 3 Stunden, so wird man beim 2ten Mal nur die Hälfte der Zeit benötigen.
Ingesamt kann ich Abyss empfehlen, das Spiel hat mir persönlich viel Freude bereitet.

author: {'steamid': '76561197995423231', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 433, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 408, 'last_played': 1419202482}
review: Extremely awkward and cheesy dialogues/voice acting and a b-movie tier story, but still enjoyable for what it is eventhough the puzzles don't make much sense at times (i.e. hidden object minigames that ask you to find 20 items such as fishes, bottles and a doll to magically "craft" scissors)

review: This is the strangest reimagining of Bioshock I have ever played. Literally I am confused how this game has avoided a lawsuit, but it probably has something to do with the lack of interest in a find it game with the plot of Bioshock if the plot of Bioshock did drugs.

author: {'steamid': '76561198098271490', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 255, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 248, 'last_played': 1453499481}
review: Very good hidden object game with a decent plot. Beautiful and detailed graphics and decent enough voice acting. There was some little graphic bloopers in the sceneries here and there but they really did not ruin my playing.However demon and demon’s possession are worn out. Demons? Seriously?! All you could think of? There are lot of other mythic beings or ancient parasite. Especially when the “demon” looks to be no other than Chulchu. It had worked well even let’s say like “old deity” of long lost civilisation. But I suppose demon had been just the quickes and easiest to explain things?

author: {'steamid': '76561197985232409', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 401, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 401, 'last_played': 1418531297}
review:
Is a man not entitled to the sweat of his brow? "No" says the hidden object section, "he has to find it in a big pile of crap along with an umbrella and three gears." "No" says the puzzle section, "he has to assemble a map or arrange sliding blocks the right way." I rejected those answers. Instead, I chose something different. I chose the impossible. I chose . . . the "casual" difficulty and abused the hint system.

This is a standard hidden object game with some point and click adventure game elements, puzzles and using objects on things, added in to keep things varied. Probably the most notable thing is that the plot and setting are copied from the original Bioshock.

The puzzles are bit simplistic and the hidden object sections aren't quite as cluttered as they could be, but the art is fantastic and difficulty isn't really the appeal of this kind of game anyway.

author: {'steamid': '76561198008887930', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 162, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 162, 'last_played': 1418295119}
review:
So this game likes its jumpscares so be warned.

As always hidden items games for me can be simple to super hard depending on the game.
For this one on the easiest setting the hints reset fast enough to not be frustrating and didn't reset when used for a "which way do I go" style hint.

This game suffers from the "item name/common convention/colour contrast" issue I've seen with afew of these. You're looking for a key? Well odds on its gonna be almost the same colour as its background. Looking for an umbrella? Better keep and eye out for images of one that blend into the background.

As to the voice-acting; Bland; End of story
Speaking of story its interesting and worth sitting through.

Would I recommend? Yes; At full price? Maybe not

author: {'steamid': '76561198116845541', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 274, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 274, 'last_played': 1417714830}
review:
Ein nettes Spiel für zwischendurch. Es ist in etwa vier Stunden durchgespielt und die Rätsel sind eher einfach gehalten. Diese sind jedoch abwechslungsreich gestaltet, von Suchbilder über Logik-Puzzle bis hin zu traditionellen Point and Click Aufgaben -in diesem Punkt also Daumen hoch.

Die Story wirkt hingegen recht gezwungen und vorhersehbar, allerdings ist es offensichtlich dass die Geschichte nicht das Hauptaugenmerk bei der Entwicklung war. Ich finde es jedoch super, dass man nach dem Durchspielen noch eine kurze Extrakampagne bekommt, in der die Vorgeschichte mehr beleuchtet wird.

Die Grafik (meist Standbilder) ist hübsch anzusehen und die Musik dezent gehalten.

Mein einziger und sehr klarer Kritikpunkt: Ein Übermaß an Jumpscares. Die wirken nicht nur billig und nervig, sondern sind in diesem Genre auch noch völlig deplaziert.

Insgesamt ein guter Zeitvertreib für einen Abend, aber mehr als 5€ solltet ihr dafür nicht ausgeben.

author: {'steamid': '76561198053391429', 'num_games_owned': 1193, 'num_reviews': 52, 'playtime_forever': 413, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 332, 'last_played': 1417792459}

author: {'steamid': '76561197996694804', 'num_games_owned': 830, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 344, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 288, 'last_played': 1424542748}
review:
This game looks beautiful like pretty much all of the other Artifex Mundi games and of course quite fun too.

The one thing that disappointed me was that if you do dominos on even one time you can't get the achievement for completing all hidden object puzzles without using the hint button. Likewise I'm sure is true for the achievement for completing all dominos puzzles. So, I'll have to play through the game 3 times just to get those 2 achievements. If you don't care about achievements this one really won't bug you at all.

Overall a very good game and it runs well under Linux (Ubuntu 14.04 in my case).

author: {'steamid': '76561198078143581', 'num_games_owned': 3295, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 242, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 211, 'last_played': 1416355167}
review:
Antes de jugar a Abyss, creía que los juegos de objetos ocultos no eran para mí. Vistos desde fuera me parecían aburridos, sin argumentos, lineales. Y seamos serios: "Abyss: The Wraiths of Eden" no va a ganar ningún premio por sus magníficos guiones o sus complejas animaciones. No harán una película ni venderán merchandising. 

Pero es un juego muy entretenido. 

Es un título genial para echar un rato delante del ordenador, olvidarte de todo y centrarte en salvar a tu marido Robert (que es un poco inútil). Personalmente me parece una aventura gráfica simplificada, donde tan sólo te mueves por unos cuantos escenarios y vas superando distintos puzzles. No hay mucha complejidad, pero si aún así te quedas atascado en algún momento puedes darle a ese bonito botón de «Saltar» y continuar jugando como si nada. El argumento y sus personajes, aunque no resultan excesivamente originales, cumplen con su cometido y consiguen meterte en la historia. El apartado gráfico cumple con creces en cuanto a diseño y dibujo; las animaciones son otro cantar (sobre todo las de los personajes cuando hablan, auch).

review: Dobrý příběh a prostředí, nadprůměrná grafika a hádanky dávají v rámci světa smysl. Jedna z těch opravdu dobrých her v rámci žánru.

author: {'steamid': '76561198042831386', 'num_games_owned': 598, 'num_reviews': 627, 'playtime_forever': 364, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 364, 'last_played': 1414514605}
review:
[h1]Short version: 89%[/h1]
Abyss: The Wraiths of Eden offers everything one can want in a hidden object puzzle game: a good story, fluent game flow, interesting puzzles, nice graphic design. A definite grab if you like this genre.

[h1]Long version:[/h1]
There are hidden object games that try to ascend the limits of their genre to stand out. Abyss: The Wraiths of Eden chose to be good in the known game elements instead.

Although the story is just a mishmash of Bioshock and Cthulhu, it is an almost perfect mixture. It is engaging, features genuinely good twists, and has a realistic, interesting main character. The only real downside is the voice acting, it is spectacularly bad even by hidden object standards.

The puzzles themselves are spread out evenly and offer a steady progression. They require a fair amount of backtracking, but the map design doesn’t make you feel like you are walking around endlessly. The hidden object scenes are drawn well, although they have a few problems, especially if the required item is in the water.

I also have to mention the bonus chapter: not only it gives you great insight of the main story, but it even puts one of the side characters in the limelight, adding even more depth to the game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198047378733', 'num_games_owned': 2093, 'num_reviews': 92, 'playtime_forever': 521, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 521, 'last_played': 1416319510}

author: {'steamid': '76561197964502566', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 1064, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 690, 'last_played': 1416722484}

author: {'steamid': '76561197971369815', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 77, 'playtime_forever': 461, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 461, 'last_played': 1416007443}
review: Hidden Object is one of my favourite kind of games. But DO NOT BUY IT, just  because it looks like Bioshock. Abyss is like walking in museum. Too long and too boring. Ok, you solve quite good puzzles but it's only good thing. I've played "9 Clues" before, and... WTF? So many things are almost the same! The same candy but in other package. So many things were almost the same. Once again... DO NOT BUY IT. I recommend "Infected: The Twin Vaccine." It's 100 times better.

author: {'steamid': '76561198123988416', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 455, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 454, 'last_played': 1432931901}
review:
Das Spiel macht sehr viel Spaß und ist nicht zu leicht, aber auch nicht zu schwer. Die Story finde ich sehr gelungen, auch wenn mich das Setting sehr an Rapture (Bioshock) erinnert hat. Einen Punkt abzug gibt es bei der Übersetzung der Wimmelbildgegenstände. Bei "Warmhaltebehälter" kann man sich gerade noch so eine Wärmflasche vorstellen, aber es gab noch viel abwegigere Sachen, die aber zum Glück nur sehr selten auftraten. 
Auch stimmt das Verhältnis Wimmelbild zu Minispielen und man fällt nicht von einem ins andere. In einigen Sequenzen hab ich mich so sehr erschocken, dass ich tatsächlich die Maus losgelassen habe. 
Dieses Spiel ist für alle Wimmelbildfans ein muss und eine klare Empfehlung von mir.

author: {'steamid': '76561198057579119', 'num_games_owned': 4343, 'num_reviews': 303, 'playtime_forever': 1276, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 574, 'last_played': 1572563104}
review:
Niesposób uniknąć skojarzeń z Bioshockiem, Bo chyba był to celowy zabieg twórców. I trzeba przyznać, że pomysł, by oprzeć klimat i cały świat na otoczeniu kojarzącym się jednoznacznie z Bioshockiem jest świetny. Od razu wsiąkamy w zaproponowaną nam narrację i... Świetnie się bawimy!
Bardzo dobra casualowa przygodówka z elementami HO (lub odwrotnie).

POLECAM wszystkim!

author: {'steamid': '76561198089341102', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 82, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 82, 'last_played': 1414163704}
